hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Underwater Silver Rupee Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Water Temple Small Key# and #a Wallet#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #a Forest Temple Small Key# and #the Prelude of Light#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #7# major items.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the path to #Morpha#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #a Zora Scale#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Like Like Chest

GV (Waterfall).text: Ganondorf used to be an adventurer like me, but then he took a light arrow to the knee.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Lens of Truth# can be found in #Goron City#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Iron Boots#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Fire Temple Small Key#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #like-like in Ganon's Shadow Trial# guards #a Game Key#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Shadow Trial Golden Gauntlets Chest

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that unfreezing #King Zora# grants #a Water Temple Small Key#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #Deku Stick Capacity# and #a Game Key#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #in a meadow# Sheik teaches #a Heart Container#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: Did you know that Gorons understood SRM long before speedrunners did?

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #a Spirit Temple Small Key#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #Light Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (20 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: I'm Commander Shepard, and this is my favorite Gossip Stone in Hyrule!

ToT (Left).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Boulder Maze Lower Chest

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Iron Boots#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# boulders and a melody conceal...^ #a Fairy Bottle# and #a Gerudo Training Ground Small Key#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Early Adult Right Chest

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##the Thieves' Hideout## has #0# major items.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that #at the Desert Colossus#, skulltulas at night hold...^ #Din's Fire# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #1# major item.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that plundering #the Market# is a foolish choice.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #a Green Rupee#.
